website_summaries.verdict: A unique detangling brush that doesn't break hair.
pros: This is one of the few brushes that can be used on multicultural and ethnic hair
Doesn't break hair as much as other brushes
It has won an award from Allure Magazine for being an excellent brush
cons: Be careful to follow instructions on how to use the brush

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!  Will permanently stain your sheets, scarves and clothing
customer_reviews.text: Received this yestetday and couldnt wait to try. My results? Soiled my freshly washed hair and clothes with red dye. Was happy with the smoothing results on my hair until i discovered my headwraps, clothes and bedding had pink oil stains. So if you like applying oil to your hair and brushing it out, watch out. ------------------------------------------ updates ----------------------------------------- The company ignored my bad review. 5 months later, I am still having the same issue with this brush. I absolutely stopped using this brush on days when I use light colored sheets and clothes. The leaking is not as deep but still very visible. And it is permanent even after you bleach.
customer_reviews.author: Jucelle

customer_reviews.title: I love this brush..great for my 4C texture hair.
customer_reviews.text: I give this product 10 stars if I could. I have a 4C texture hair and of African decent, this product worked wonders on my tight curls. I also used on my daughter who has a finer grade of hair and it still worked great and she did not cry at all when detangling her hair. I will be ordering more in the future. It also arrived pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Yanna

customer_reviews.title: F***ing FANTASTIC BRUSH
customer_reviews.text: This product is life changing. I have extremely thick and long hair, it used to take me 30+ minutes to brush the knots out! With this brush, it takes 6 minutes maximum! Brushing is completely painless, no more yanking my head around. You can brush straight from scalp to ends without making your eyes water or pulling out wads of hair! Well worth the money, I’ve ordered more for my friends so they can experience the beauty of this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Mace

customer_reviews.title: A huge let down
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally review but this one product was so disappointing that I have to say something. This brush did not detangle AND ii tears my hair out. I have given it 3 opportunities to work and after the first time, I researched again and again to make sure I was using the brush correctly. I bought it on the recommendation of curly proverbz. It's the first time that she has let me down but there it is. I cannot recommend to those with course, natural hair.
customer_reviews.author: Judith D

customer_reviews.title: Best brush!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST brush I have purchased, ever! Myself and my 2 daughters have long hair that gets easily matted and tangled. The image shows the left side of my my daughters hair without being brushed (bad I know), and the right side brushed silky smooth within a couple minutes. I've tried a few different brushes, including the Wet Brush. So impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to more expensive brushes
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, thin, straight hair that's prone to breakage and tangles. I was not ready to shell out the kind of money needed to get a good boar bristle brush and saw an article recommending this brush to people with fine/thin hair, so decided to try this first. It's definitely more gentle on my hair than other brushes have been, but still de-tangles well. Bonus that you can comb wet hair with it, and that it's easy to clean plastic. It does still pull a little, but minimally. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: 4c hair? Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is LEGIT. Prior to this I was using 2 types of Denman brushes and gobs of Knot Today to detangle my 4c hair; it took at least 30-45 minutes. THEN I GOT THIS BRUSH. It went through my hair like butter. Detangling went from 30-45 minutes to 10-20 minutes. Admittedly I’m pretty easy to please but this brush is my holy grail.
customer_reviews.author: - where’s the package

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Slips right out of my hands. Works well. I would rate a 5 if it had a handle or something to make it easier to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: My 3b/c porous curls do not approve.
customer_reviews.text: Does not make my life easier, I'll stick to a regular brush for now. Made my tangles worse in some places by making those micro-knots, which I don't usually get. My curls do not approve.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Dont angle it
customer_reviews.text: Its very good, how it works is that if it hits a knot it cant pull free the bristle bends and releases it and several passes will work the knot out. Dont angle the brush outward preventing the bristles from bending or you'll have a hard time and get breakage. The bristles need to bend and release the knots so you dont break the hair. Just do several passes if the first doesnt get it and start from the bottom. The only real 'special' thing about this brush is the soft bristles that give and bend rather than ripping your hair out.
customer_reviews.author: Jabber

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: For me this thing is absolutely useless. If you have thin straight hair - well, maybe, I don’t know. But as I assume any brush would work for thin straight hair. For thick curly hair it’s always tricky to find a right brush. This brush was advertised as very helpful. Now I can tell the truth: it is just marketing. This brush is total waste of money. Piece of garbage. Maybe for the cat? Well, I do not think so. My cat has much better options.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: A parent's life saver!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is a lifesaver! My 5 year old has curly blonde hair that tangles up in her sleep and when she plays. Brushing used to be impossible and combing would not only take forever, but also include lots of crying. With the Tangle Teaser I can run through her hair very quickly and she barely notices! With the palm held shape, she's even able to brush on her own, although she needs help reaching the back. Definitely a must buy for parents with little girls!
customer_reviews.author: Bijoux

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for natural/curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this brush so much I made a post about it on Instagram. It detangled/ dematted my wash in go that was in for 6 days.. ENOUGH SAID
customer_reviews.author: SweetPea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Detangler
customer_reviews.text: This is the most absolute amazing hair detangler i have invested in !!! I wish I had known about this 4 years ago when I first began my natural hair journey! It would have definitely made wash days a whole lot easier and detangling less painful ! I am in love with this and definitely recommend it for anyone who’s natural. I’m pretty sure It works well with ALL hair types.
customer_reviews.author: d. ruff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to detangle but bends over time for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: I have thick coily 4c hair with a majority medium hair width strands. This hair comb is good for thick hair while in small sections but hair resistance and Tangles will bend the bristles over time. It detangles my hair with minimal breakage in short time but I recommend the teezer built for thick hair. I use this on moisturized “dry” hair or on a hair with product applied. I’m not sure if this contributes to split ends though. Cleaning the tangle terser however it can be difficult thing to do since the hair gets stuck in small bristles. Other than that, it is not a bad hair comb.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: I dont like this
customer_reviews.text: This got such great reviews but I didn't like it. It feels awful in your hand. It is bulky and uncomfortable to hold. It does detangle but it pulls out a ton of my hair!! If you have to try this buy the one with a regular handle.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine for my mom who has thinner hair, but my hair is thicker and this couldn't cut through it. I could brush the top layer of hair fine, but it couldn't reach through to the scalp. My hair is by no means amazingly thick. I would say average thick, so I should be able to at least brush it. That is not too much to ask in my opinion. Also it's awkward to not have a handle to hold when brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Riley L.

customer_reviews.title: which gets tangled very easily. I've tried many combs and brushes
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair, which gets tangled very easily. I've tried many combs and brushes; most pulling the tangles out in clumps rather than detangling them. After reading the reviews, I decided to give this one a try. I was impressed with how well it works. My only caveat is that the bristles are very short so I have to put my hand behind my hair when brushing it out as the short bristles don't always make it all of the way through my thick hair. I would recommend this brush to anyone suffering from tangles in dry or wet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Monster Tamer
customer_reviews.text: My youngest has hair down past her bottom, shes 7, and has a TON of THICK, WAVY hair, usually entailing crying to get all the knots out every morning, even when we wash dry and brush at night. This thing managed to get all her tangles in 10 minutes vs our normal 30
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Glides through My Natural Hair like Silk
customer_reviews.text: I ignored the initial craze if this brush but thought I'd give it a try when a friend raved over the ease she had detangling her type 4 hair with it. I have 3b(3c in the crown) , all natural, hair type and facts , this glides through my hair like no other wet or dry. I feel like I've been detangling my hair all wrong up until now.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: VERY expensive for a hairbrush but it actually works!
customer_reviews.text: This hairbrush is super expensive! But the catch is that it actually works. I have thick Asian hair that often get tangles in it and this detangles it quickly yet gently. I only lose 1-3 hairs every-time I use it as opposed to 10+ when I use other hair brushes! But this hair brush is honestly sooo expensive that it would break my heart to replace it if I ever were to lose/break it. I also wish amazon would carry other designs and better colors of this hair brush! (Ex. The grey marble design that tangle teezer’s website carries)
customer_reviews.author: J Ali

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST BRUSH!
customer_reviews.text: Ok this brush is magic! My 4 year old toddler actually lets me brush her Super curly hair with no tears! AWESOME AWESOME AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.author: PatriciaIPG

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomic, compact, but scratchy
customer_reviews.text: I like this brush, my wife does not. The ergonomic shape is novel and pleasant to use. It is also compact so it takes up less space in the drawer. The tines are rather pointed and do not have the spheres at the tips, so the brushing can be rather scratchy on your scalp. I have dry skin, so I like this "exfoliation" but my wife does not and finds it uncomfortable. The brush has proven durable though. I don't have long enough hair to speak towards the detangling claims, but my wife did not seem to find a significant difference between this and a standard brush with wet or dry hair.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Quickly attack tangles
customer_reviews.text: Love how quickly this brush eliminates tangles from my thick, curly hair. I use it both for detangling and styling to comb leave in conditioner and styling products through my hair. I've noticed less shedding after several weeks of use as well. This is such an awesome brush!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. V

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely fine, thin shoulder length hair that gets impossibly tangled if I look at it hard. Trying to comb it out after shampooing was almost impossible, taking a considerable amount of time, causing even more hair loss and a fair amount of pain. I saw this and decided to try it, even though I really didn't expect much. To my surprise, when I used it today after my shower, it was truly amazing. Not only did it glide through my hair almost effortlessly, but it untangled my hair in just a few strokes, completely without pain. Wow!
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for kinky hair
customer_reviews.text: I have very kinky and thick 4c hair and was in need of something to help with detangling during wash days. I saw many reviews for this before ordering and I am very happy I did. I’ve only used it during wash days and when my hair is wet but it helps to detangle my hair without snagging too much and smooths the leave in throughout my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is ridiculously amazing. My 6 year old and I have had screaming matches for years about her hair. She hated brushing it. She screamed and said it hurt when I brushed it. Nothing helped. Until this brush. The first few days we literally had to limit her time with it because she was brushing her hair so much. She almost missed the bus because she wouldn’t stop brushing her hair. She had brushed her own hair and fixed it every day since owning this brush. It’s honestly a miracle product and I tell all my friends. For what it’s worth-my daughter has very fine moderately thick, straight hair.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I Prefer My Denman Brush
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products I bought after seeing someone with Afro hair like mine rave about it on Youtube. I'm convinced I was the victim of clickbait. This product is okay. The shape isn't ideal for handling kinky hair since you can't get a good grip (ESPECIALLY if you have product on your hand). You have to really push the product into your strands for it to even begin to detangle anything. I've managed to detangle my hair with this, but I reach for my denman brush more than I do this. It also makes this very interesting sound that....doesn't sound great when pulling your tangled hair through it.
customer_reviews.author: Faithe Beadle

customer_reviews.title: great at detangling
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter. She would brush her hair and use an half bottle of detangler. She won't use conditioner b/c it stings her eyes. Anyway, even though she brushed her hair, it still looked like she just got out of bed. Her hair is thick with lots of body. My granddaughter used the brush the first time and was thrilled. No detangler, no pulling, no pain and it looked like she brushed her hair. I was surprised how well it worked.
customer_reviews.author: BFG

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: THIS!!!!! I can’t believe how well this works. My hair is so hair to comb through after a shower. Even with high end conditioners. I’ve seen this brush for a while and kinda was like whatever. Well I kept seeing it and kept seeing the good reviews. I finally gave in and ordered it. Well.... I used it immediately and all I can say is WOW! It works really well. I am going to buy another one to carry in my beach bag. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: l

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly impressed!
customer_reviews.text: So when I first got this brush, it was a little bit smaller than I expected, but then I realized that it actually was just the right size because it fits perfectly in my hand. (It’s about 3/4 my average sized hands) Then when I used it on my tangled hair, WOW! It is the best hairbrush I’ve ever used! It got through all of my hair knots extremely quick and was 99% painless. I’m super impressed! I never write reviews, but just ordered a bunch of things recently and have the time to do reviews on my favorites and disappointed buys. Anyways, love this brush! Going to recommend to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Works SO well...try it
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old has fine shoulder length hair that tangles every 5 mins all day every day. She usually runs screaming when I pull out a brush. But this, she says she can't even feel it, and it's not pulling or yanking her hair out. SO happy, have already recommended to others after only 4 days using this. Used on my wet hair this morning, I have long thick layered hair and I feel a larger one of these would be better for my hair when it's wet (this works fine on my hair when dry).
customer_reviews.author: Justthe2ofus

customer_reviews.title: It really works for detangling
customer_reviews.text: I have thick hair and was always fighting with it combing it out until I discovered this. I'm on my second one since after time the bristles got a bit weak. But when I say after time, I'm talking about seven years! It's fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works on uncombable hair
customer_reviews.text: We have a two-year-old with hair that does not lay flat. Combs get stuck in her hair. I read about the man who invented this brush helping a girl who had hair that looks like our daughter's hair, and I figured this was inexpensive enough to give it a chance. It works! It untangles her hair very quickly and does not hurt her. The pictures are before and after photos.
customer_reviews.author: friskefox

customer_reviews.title: Cool but I'm left handed?
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice. It gets through tangles really easily and I can hold it comfortably most of the time. I just dont know how to comfortably hold it in my right hand
customer_reviews.author: dornza10

customer_reviews.title: Actually does what it's supposed to do, and does it well!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing!! It works both in and out of the shower and doesn't snag or pull no matter how crazy my hair is. I was surprised it actually worked on wet and unbrushed hair in the shower, but it did so with zero effort. Also works well for getting conditioner brushed in deep and all the way through! Bonus points for how cute the yellow and pink version is.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get.
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally got the wrong one. So I decided to try it. Dear god this is not for all hair types.. If you have curly hair make sure you don't get this one. You'll need to go on the mian page and looks for the one for super curly hair. I got that one years ago and wanted to replace it. The one I got years ago is amazing it take less then 20 minutes to get my hair detailed. This one here ripped hair from my scalp and took a good hour to do my hair.
customer_reviews.author: RJL

customer_reviews.title: Rips out my hair
customer_reviews.text: It detangles but you will lose all your hair. I have to apply a lot of conditioner to my hair before using the detangler. I only use it after I have finger detangled and used a wide tooth comb. Even then it still rips out my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Toria O

customer_reviews.title: Banish brush lint!
customer_reviews.text: The downfall of most hairbrushes and the bane of my existence is the lint that collects and cannot be removed without pulling the balls off the end of the bristles which then makes the brush scratch tour scalp and you cry—- no more. The ends of this brush are round without the lint-trapping balls that steal my sanity. It detangles like a dream, but that to me is secondary.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer B.

customer_reviews.title: Great For 2A Hair
customer_reviews.text: Low stress on my hand, which is great. I use this one after the shower and all throughout the day. I even let my husband brush out my hair with this and it was a pleasant experience. I have very tangle-prone 2A hair and really need bristles that don't flex too much. This does a great job with it, usually without adding my leave-in detangler.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dean Mack

customer_reviews.title: Favorite hair brush
customer_reviews.text: SERIOUSLY, this brush is amazing. I've never had the experience of brushing my hair pain free. Never. Until this brush. I am so impressed by it. My hair is still thicker than this product can do, I have to rotate my hair around a lot to get both sides but even then, it's still the closest to correct for my thick hair haha. Thanks who ever designed this brush!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great brush, but no miracles.
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd be able to use a brush on my 4c hair, but this worked. Works great on wet hair, and it significantly reduced the time it took me to detangle my hair for twisting. The grip has a bit of a learning curve. Also, I shed almost as much hair as I usually do with a comb, though it was much gentler on the scalp. Still, it's a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: The Harvest Queen

customer_reviews.title: Wavy and curly hair friendly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after seeing a wavy-curly hair routine on YouTube. I use it in the shower after I've lathered conditioner in my hair. I have waist length 2c hair. This brush is awesome! Takes all knots out without hurting me and it doesn't disrupt my wave pattern. Threw away my old shower wide toothed comb after finding this beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs O

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for beards!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this freakin brush man! I got this for my beard not for my head. My beard gets so bushy and coarse. This brush works awesome for me. I find myself brushing my beard atleast 20 times a day because I just like the way the brush feels. Guys get this if you have a beard. You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Great detangler that leaches red dye the first few uses
customer_reviews.text: This detangler definitely does the job. I would suggest finger detangling and using a large tooth comb before going in with this comb to minimize breakage. I saw a review mentioning the product leaked red dye—I experienced the same thing. I saw the dye in my hair after detangling with Aussie Moist conditioner. I attempted to soak it in vinegar overnight but this did not help. It leached into my hair 3-4 wash days before running clean.
customer_reviews.author: LavenderElle2

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Comb is leaking color!! Thats bad
customer_reviews.text: I have been using to comb my daughter’s frizzy hair and they seem to be tamed while using this comb. Will check out few more days. I have thick hair and I tried to use it on my hair but it doesnt go all the way in, it is not suitable for thick hair..otherwise its good. Edit to add: It started to bleed color. I was trying to clean it with white.m cloth and that entire cloth is turned yellow. Not good. I gave 4 stars before..But I am moving it down to 2.
customer_reviews.author: Priyamvada

customer_reviews.title: Detangling but the teeth hurt my right ear
customer_reviews.text: Conclusion: it works but not worthy for 14.99. It basically uses plastic on every part of the product. The teeth is quite spiky (not gonna poke through but still kinda hurt) and hard, isn’t soft/flexible/whatever this kind of comb should be. The other parts are all plastic which makes this product look&feel cheap.....it makes me doubting the authenticity......but it still can detangle my short hair, fyi, I just use hair mask yesterday. (Then I pause writing review and put down my phone to comb my hair with this product, it hurts my right ear......)
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love tangle teaser. I haven’t used another brush over a year and I notice my hair isn’t frizzy and it’s thicker than before because no breakage! If you’ve conditioned your hair and you’re certain there aren’t too many knots or tangles, it’s totally okay to brush your hair when it’s wet. But usually I wouldn’t recommend brushing wet hair
customer_reviews.author: Ss_88

customer_reviews.title: Why the hype?
customer_reviews.text: This toilet scrub quality wonder tool is over hyped. Wet or dry hair, detangling takes a long time. And mind you, I have fine and thin hair. Also seems like the bristles are scraping the hair. I even tried it used it as a scalp massager, it's worthless for that too...
customer_reviews.author: My two cents...

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4c hair and I gotta say it detangles my hair really well I usually use it when my hair is damp from a shower or while adding a moisturizer. And there is a lot less shedding for my hair as well
customer_reviews.author: Chidima Ifezue

customer_reviews.title: It ACTUALLY works!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but after using this brush I had to. I’m convinced this thing is witchcraft. I have very curly hair that I comb with a wide toothed comb in the shower using loads of conditioner. Takes forever. I was very skeptical of this little brush, but holy cow. When they say it detangles- it DOES! When they say it doesn’t pull- IT DOESN’T. I was shocked. In just a few strokes my hair was done. It was amazing. Everyone should own one of these things.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush Ever
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even say enough good things about this brush. I have average thickness 3B & 3C curls. My only regret is that I didn’t buy it sooner. It literally detangles my hair in seconds—just don’t use it dry. Make sure you’re using something like a pre-poo along with this brush. Trust me, you won’t regret it. It’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Goodale

customer_reviews.title: Shower staple!
customer_reviews.text: I have really long hair and it is hard to sometimes get the tangles out. I keep this in my shower. After I condition my hair, I run this through my hair and it helps tremendously! I recommend the product. It would be great to take on vacation and put in your beach bag too!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa V

customer_reviews.title: Amazed
customer_reviews.text: For years, I've used a large toothed comb, regardless of whether I had long or short hair. I saw this as a lightning deal and decided to try it. At first, it didn't seem like it was doing anything - like it was just gliding over the top. Then I realized it was gliding through my hair. I let my hair air dry and it has never felt so soft!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. K.

customer_reviews.title: Can't go without it now
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely thick hair, and this can brush through it wet or dry without breaking it. Great for fully combing in a leave-in conditioner, which before was nearly impossible for me. My hair is less tangled, broken, and frizzy. Without this I probably would have given up on long hair and cropped it short again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Walton

customer_reviews.title: Great to detangle curly hair and easy to grip
customer_reviews.text: I love this tangle teezer. I've tried so many tangle teezer and the original one is my favorite. I have very curly hair and I purchased the red teezer for curly hair but I felt like that one was too hard on my hair and it didn't detangle my hair as fast and smooth like the original one. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I used to dread washing my hair because brushing and drying it was so tedious but after about a month of using this tangle ...
customer_reviews.text: I will never use another brush again. I used to dread washing my hair because brushing and drying it was so tedious but after about a month of using this tangle teezer, it's been so easy to do both AND I've gotten a ton of compliments on how shiny my hair is. I've also noticed I shed significantly less and my hair dries faster when I use this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy A.

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I have 3b/3c curly hair. To be honest I had very little hope that this brush would work. Boy was I wrong, it is a game changer. It takes me less time to detangle my hair with less hair loss with detangling. I have been using a wide tooth comb exclusively since I was a teenager and I don’t think that I will ever go back. The only thing I would change is possibly a handle so that it would be easier to brush the whole length of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Alot of shedding
customer_reviews.text: It did detangle my hair but it lead me to have soooooo much shedding I am going back to the wide tooth comb. I will never use this product again.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Best Option For Detangling
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many different detangling brushes since my hair is just so bad with tangles, and I have yet to find one better than this. It's not extremely better than the more common ones, but just seems to go through my hair gently and with the least effort or pain. I don't like the curve it has, but it's not that big of a con. The no handle design makes it easy for storage and travel - not to mention it's a decent price. When I have trouble with my hair, this is my go to brush.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush! The components are super hardy, so this brudh could definitely take a beating. It's portable enough to travel with; and since the inside is hollow, it's also very light. I love that I could take it in the shower with me if I wanted to gently brush through my hair with conditioner. My sister has curly hair, but mine is straight. Both of us have fine, thin hair - and we both use this brand on the regular. If you're on the fence, I'd highly recommend it! 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Kianna

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical, but no more. This brush is great. No more pulling out a lot of hair when I brush it. I have medium curly hair and it kinks us bad after washing even with conditioner. This is a miracle for my hair. And it reduced the hair that gets pulled out when brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Brigit B

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I heard about this brush from my hairdresser. I’ve purchased and tried several different so called de tangle brushes which just broke off more hair and did not work very well. So far, this has been the best one I’ve tried. You still have to go slowly and use some sort of cream rinse or spray on de tangle product, but it works better, quicker and with less hair loss than any other de tangle brush I’ve tried. I give it a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for general brushing
customer_reviews.text: I only use it after I wash my hair, it does work and help to untangle my hair but if you’re trying to part your hair, it won’t work as well as the regular comb. It looks pretty and all but I still uses my regular comb, it makes it look finer. Only use this one for untangle purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkysup670

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer for Tangled Hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have literally tried everything when it comes to helping to ease tangled hair. I am Caucasian, in my mid thirties, with thick wavy, but very fine blonde hair. And this is the best product I have found. I use detangling conditioner, as well as a leave in spray after I shower. I have tried the Wet Brushes, which do help. But this product is the best at not pulling or breaking, and helps me comb through my hair post shower in a reasonable amount of time. A true game changer for me and my routine. Very happy with this and recommend to those with similar issues.
customer_reviews.author: M. Marty

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this based on other reviews, and I was very impressed. I get less hair pulled, and it is very comfortable to use. I feel as though I am not pulling as much on my hair. As long as you start from the bottom and work your way up you won't have any problems. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not great for Slippery Hands. Get version w/Handle
customer_reviews.text: Great detangler for my type 4 hair. Unfortunately, I am not a fan due to it being difficult to grip when my hands are covered in creams and oils. I purchased the handle version last week and LOVE it. Great product. Just needs a handle for those with slippery hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: If you have thick hair, if you have a lot of hair, if you have long thick curly hair like me: this is not the brush for you. The bristles are too flexible to actually de-tangle anything. They just run right over the knots. Maybe this is a good brush for someone else with a different hair type but this brush did not live up to the hype. Works as a nice scalp massage in the shower?
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Good, use with water and some conditioner/leave in.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good detangler... its quick but it makes you cringe bc you’ll definitely feel like you’re ripping your hair out of your scalp but you won’t be. Don’t add a lot of hair but a good section that’s still thick. It seems to work better when there’s more hair going through it rather than a small section of hair... weird. Had a horrible smell when I got it and the combs will start to bend after awhile. It may help so you’d have to try to see if you like it. Some will and some won’t
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Best brush ever!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! How have I not had one of these before now! My daughter went natural almost 2 years ago after years of relaxers and braids so I had forgotten how hard it was to actually detangle her hair. I have tried so many different brushes and hair care products that did not work so I was skeptical. This brush did not disappoint. It is amazing to brush through tight kinky curls. I highly recommend the Tangle Teaser.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Todd

customer_reviews.title: Just okay, wouldn’t recommend to others
customer_reviews.text: I’d describe my hair as long, straight, and relatively thick. I wasn’t entirely impressed by this brush, which was disappointing considering the fantastic reviews. I haven’t experienced much of an improvement versus using a regular brush (or comb) and brushing the ends of my hair first and then running the brush from top to bottom. Also, the bristles are quite short, so I have to run the brush through my hair more often than say a regular brush. Overall, just okay. Keeping the brush, because it’s handy to have and ultimately does the job.
customer_reviews.author: OccasionalAmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! Less Breakage
customer_reviews.text: After a week or so of use I really like this. Works really well, the bristles are of varying height which I think helps prevent tangling and unnecessary breakage. Before brushing I also spray on Pantene conditioning mist and the combo has been great. The brush itself is a little awkward to hold but I’ll get used to it as it’s not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: It does wonders
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn't think this would work for my hair but it does wondered. I'm of African descent so I have thick curly hair and I have lots of hair. It does the job and then some. The main reason why I love this brush though is because when I detangle my hair It doesn't hurt. I think this would be a very good brush when detangling a child's hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Great for damaged hair
customer_reviews.text: I have the most insanely bleached damaged/fried hair in the world, to the point where I typically can't brush or even touch my hair when it's wet. I was skeptical about this brush, but it actually doesn't feel like I'm setting my scalp on fire when I brush! It detangles super easily when my hair is dry, and it even works through my wet hair without stretching or breaking it. Probably the only brush/comb I'm ever going to use again, love it
customer_reviews.author: Lem

customer_reviews.title: Easy for kids to use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush for my 6 yo daughter, who hates getting her hair brushed (she has a tender head) and has trouble brushing her own hair. This brush is very easy for her to hold and use herself, and she says it doesn't pull her hair as much as other brushes do. The bristles are also fairly soft, but it is made of a sturdy plastic and I feel like it will last for a long time. Overall, I am very happy with this brush and would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: NArrowB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my thick curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I have used a pick all my life to untangle my hair until now. I wanted to try something different because it seemed like the pick was pulling out so much of my hair. This brush is amazing! The bristles feel like they are too thin or weak, but they are not! When I first ran it through my dry hair, it felt like it wasn't doing anything and that the bristles were just too short and thin, BUT it was working! It completely smoothed my hair. I use it mostly in the shower to detangle and have noticed I'm a lot less hair than before.
customer_reviews.author: K.N.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing. Small but still works just fine! Detangles wel, feels amazing on your scalp, defrizzes your hair. My friend in London told me about hers and I was happy to find it on Amazon rather than have her ship me one to America.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter have VERY tight curly hair. She uses this brush and ONLY this brush. She even took it with her when going to the salon for a trim so the stylist could use it.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: The best brush for thin hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair is baby fine and extreamly thin. After I wash my hair it's hard to get the tangles out without pulling hair out and braking my hair. This is the best brush I've ever used. I bought one and fell in love. So a few months later I bought two more to have on hand. I love them. You definately have to to have at least one.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Im glad I finally bought one
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product because I read alot of bad reviews but this worked for me and I have thick natural hair and it helped me detangle my hair after I washed and put in some detangling products in my hair I should have bought two and it didnt bring any of my hair out
customer_reviews.author: T. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great brush.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably our 3 one, they last pretty long, you do have to clean it before it gets to the point of tossing it. My girls love it as it’s easy to grasp, does a great job detangling and with no struggle. And compact enough for backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzy Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Not for the wavy/curly hair type
customer_reviews.text: Not sure it this is worth $10 or not. It flies out of my hand anytime I hit a snag and I feel like it’s “tangle free” because it doesn’t go deep enough to get all the hair. Probably would be a fine brush for those with straight/semi straight hair. But curly/wavy hair types do not do as well as expected. Works the same as a normal brush.
customer_reviews.author: Kendal

customer_reviews.title: The best detangling brush
customer_reviews.text: Love this detangling tool. I had heard a lot about it and wanted to try it. So glad that I did. Highly recommended this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the tangle teezer on my 3C/4A type hair
customer_reviews.text: For years I have been putting off buying this product. Because I assumed it was for straighter hair textures. I finally became brave and order the tangle teezer after watching a few YouTube reviews. And I'm glad I made this purchase it was a great investment. The teaser turned my normal 2 hour detangling process into a 40 minute job. With minimal hair shed and no pain. Will definitely be buying more in other colors just for the heck of it.
customer_reviews.author: Vona

customer_reviews.title: Finally the hair struggle is over!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has an extremely sensitive scalp. Brushing her hair was a fight every day. I had seen this item recommended online. When this came in my daughter brushed her hair herself all the way home from the post office. The daily fighting is gone! This works on her extremely thick hair wet or dry. It takes a little getting used to holding it. I will never buy another brush for her hair again, only this one!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Richard

customer_reviews.title: Best detangler
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brush I can used on my daughters long, thick hair to get out the tangles. It does not rip her hair and while it takes some getting used to, it is easy to use. I do still have to wet down her hair with water but I don't need tons of product the way I would with any other brush. We truly love it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Perez

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I took off one start because the brush feels very cheap, light, like a brush for a doll. However, it cut down the time it takes me to detangle my long and thick hair by half. I still use the tresemme detangler spray but it takes less to brush my hair. The quantity of hair that comes out is also the same.
customer_reviews.author: KayH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This changed everything!! Trying to comb my toddlers hair was a nightmare. He picked this up right away and started combing his hair and then let me help too—NO complaints for once! He said it felt good :)

customer_reviews.title: No tangle tears
customer_reviews.text: This brush is amazing! It’s the only one my little girl will let me use on her hair with absolutely no tears. We have 3 total that we keep in the bathrooms and then one for our pool/ beach bag for convenience. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Just wow. I was skeptical when I ordered it. I have long hair with tight fingers and curls. It always tangles and knots. I tried with dry hair and it went straight through. Easy to hold. Is there a model with a handle?
customer_reviews.author: Donald L. Criger

customer_reviews.title: Best hair detangler ever!
customer_reviews.text: The best hair brush ever! Easy to use and easy on our daughter's thick hair! No more screaming and struggling!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best amazon buy ever
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best thing I’ve ever bought. Does exactly what it’s supposed to do. I didn’t even feel any tugs it pulls when I brushed my hair out with this (I have long hair that gets tangled so easily). Definitely telling everyone to buy this, and will be buying again to have extras on hand for traveling. This has been my favorite purchase off amazon, and I buy a lot from amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap but will detangle you
customer_reviews.text: It feels really cheap and flimsy. I expected more sturdiness. Maybe a detangling brush is supposed to feel that way? I dunno. It does detangle nicely without pulling out my easily falling out hair. Also it's 10 bucks so I played myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: our morning are easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: This brush has changed our lives! I only wish I knew it existed sooner to save us from our sensitive-headed daughter's teary brushing sessions. Now, our morning are easy and quick, and drama free. We bought two of these so that we can be sure to never be without one even if it should get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C

customer_reviews.title: Necessary purchase
customer_reviews.text: You need to buy this! My hair stylist recommended it to me and I use it everyday. It's great for head scratches in the shower, detangling, scrubbing the scalp to reduce dandruff, and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not good for 3c/4a hair. Bristled aren't long enough (I have chin length hair if it's stretched but with shrinkage it's above my ear, so it's not like I have super long hair). The bristles weren't sturdy enough to actually detangle, my hair was a lot stronger than the brush. It kept slipping out of my hand. And it was especially horrible on my ends. This will only work- and even then, not a lot- if you finger detangle first.
customer_reviews.author: W_

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Honey I am loving this detangler I bought this one and the new one with handle I have 3c4a hair this one detangle easily the new one with handle and longer bristles pulled at my hair like the denman brush it's better than that one also if you have thick long hair curly it works the only negative is if you have product on your hands for slip it could slip out your hands
customer_reviews.author: jazmin goldsborough

customer_reviews.title: Yay
customer_reviews.text: I love the feeling of the bristles on my scalp~ maybe that's just me. Cute brush, I got it because of a youtuber lol, but it was worth it. I have very fine unhappy hair and this works great at not ripping it to shreads.
customer_reviews.author: Maomi

customer_reviews.title: Different kind of comb
customer_reviews.text: I still like using a comb but this works great. Easy for the little ones to use. Give it few trya before you give up on it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harry

customer_reviews.title: Detangles my hair well without the ouch!
customer_reviews.text: Detangles well especially on dry hair 4c hair. I have big hands so it some times slips when using on wet hair. Wish they had an extra large/long version.
customer_reviews.author: unique poston

product_meta.title: Tangle Teezer The Original, Wet or Dry Detangling Hairbrush for All Hair Types - Panther Black
product_meta.description: Color:Panther BlackIt created to help promote fuller, stronger, flowing manes and tails people continue to discover this hair care solution for themselves. It delivers essential moisture to dry, damaged, and neglected hair. Keeps hair soft, and manageable.
feature_bullets: THE PERFECT WET OR DRY HAIRBRUSH. Manage your mane post shower or when it’s dry as you gain control and say goodbye to frizz. Comb through knots and tangles freely using an easy grip with the Tangle Teezers ergonomic palm-shaped design.

INNOVATIVE DESIGN. The unique two-tiered system has long teeth to detangle and short teeth to smooth the hair cuticle. This award-winning brush allows you to brush your hair with minimum fuss, breakage, and damage, leaving you with glossy locks.
LOCKS YOU LOVE. This easy to use detangling hairbrush gives you the control you need and confidence you want to make every hair day a good one.

QUICK & EASY DETANGLING. Detangling is the first step to beautiful hair. Comb through your locks effortlessly with the Panther Black Original as you reduce breakage and add shine for healthier looking hair.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
